titleStmt.title: A funeral sermon occasioned by the death of Mr. William Rathband an aged and learned servant of Christ, and preached Octob. 13. 1695. at Highgate. By Samuel Slater, M.A. minister of the gospel.
titleStmt.author: Slater, Samuel, d. 1704.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Thomas Cockerill, senr and junr, at the Three Legs in the Poultrey, over-against the Stocks-Market,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in Dr. Williams' Library, London.
